steps.name: Log in complaints in the complaint register
steps.description:
The register should contain the following information:  
 Date, Customer name, Item, Complaints details, Staff attending to customer, Comments of staff, Resolution and Status of Complaint

steps.name: Also, indicate the status to the customer including feedback so the customer is in the loop

process.name: Receving and responding to complaints about a defective/broken/missing Item or poor service

steps.name: Empathise and apologize to the customer in this format: “Sorry for the inconvenience (acknowledge the message)
Offer and execute a solution. For instance, ask the customer relevant questions about the product such as “what battery did you use?
Follow-up with the customer to ensure that they are satisfied with the solution and thank them for their business.

If the issue has not be resolved, inform the customer that a Sales person would contact them directly via phone to resolve the issue. Give them a timeline i.e. before COB or during work hours the next day.
